login.title: Login
login.signUpLink: No account yet? Get one for free!

rightPanel.title: Welcome back to NG Zero Effort!
rightPanel.description: Logging in feels like coming home. Dive into your account effortlessly and stay connected with ease. Your digital hub awaits – let's get started!

rightPanel.title: Welcome to NG Zero Effort!
rightPanel.description: Joining is as easy as 1-2-3. Create your account in no time and unlock a world of possibilities. Let's get you started on your new journey!

rightPanel.title: Get a new NG Zero Effort password
rightPanel.description: Can't remember your password? No worries, it happens! Enter your email, and we'll help you get back into your account. Let's get you reconnected!

confirmationRequired.title: Confirmation required
confirmationRequired.description: To complete your registration, please check your email for a confirmation link. Click the link to verify your email address and activate your account. If you didn't receive the email, be sure to check your spam folder or request a new link. We're excited to have you with us!

rightPanel.title: Confirm your NG Zero Effort email
rightPanel.description: Almost there! Check your email for a magical link to complete the process. Click it, and you'll be all set – it's like unlocking a secret door!

passwordLinkSent.title: Password Reset Link Sent
passwordLinkSent.description: Your password reset request has been successfully processed. We have sent an email containing a password reset link to the email address associated with your account. Please check your inbox (and spam/junk folder) for the email and follow the instructions to reset your password. The link will be valid for a limited time for security purposes.

rightPanel.title: Reset link is on the way
rightPanel.description: You’ve summoned the mystical Password Reset Link. It's en route to your inbox. While you wait, grab a coffee or do a happy dance. If the email is hiding, check your spam or junk folder. If it’s vanished into the ether, our support wizards are ready to assist. Happy resetting!

emailConfirmed.title: Welcome on board!
emailConfirmed.description: Your email has been successfully confirmed! Your account is now fully activated, and you can start enjoying all the features we offer. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Welcome to the community!

rightPanel.title: NG Zero Effort email confirmed!
rightPanel.description: Email confirmed! You're officially in – let the fun begin! Time to explore your new digital playground!

formErrors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
formErrors.minPasswordLength: Password should be at least 6 characters

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your Central Hub for Insights and Analytics
dashboard.message: You have completed the registration and login process. This is your starting point to begin building your dashboard. If you have any advice or suggestions to improve this repository, please send them via email to gianluca.paris@outlook.com or open a pull request ☺️

errorMessages.auth/email-already-in-use: The specified email already exists, please log in
errorMessages.auth/weak-password: Password should be at least 6 characters
errorMessages.auth/invalid-credential: The credentials you entered are not valid
errorMessages.auth/too-many-requests: Too many attempts, try again later
